sailpoint.object

Interface Scorer


  • public interface Scorer
    The interface of a class that provides scoring services.

    • Method Summary

      Update score state from one object.
      void update(SailPointContext context, ScoreConfig scoreConfig)
      Update the ScoreConfig with any changes that might have been made in configuration files specific to this scorer

      • getScore

        int getScore(ScoreDefinition def,
           GenericIndex card)
        Extract the score value maintained by this Scorer from the Scorecard. This is used in the calculation of composite scores from an partially refreshed scorecard.

      • update

        void update(SailPointContext context,
          ScoreConfig scoreConfig)
        Update the ScoreConfig with any changes that might have been made in configuration files specific to this scorer
        Parameters:
        context - Current SailPointContext
        scoreConfig - ScoreConfig object that needs to be updated
